fields.name: profileIconId
fields.doc: ID of the summoner icon associated with the summoner.

fields.name: name
fields.doc: Summoner name.

fields.name: summonerLevel
fields.doc: Summoner level associated with the summoner.

fields.name: revisionDate
fields.doc: Date summoner was last modified specified as epoch milliseconds. The following events will update this timestamp: profile icon change, playing the tutorial or advanced tutorial, finishing a game, summoner name change

fields.name: id
fields.doc: Summoner ID.

fields.name: accountId
fields.doc: Account ID.

fields.name: chestGranted
fields.doc: Is chest granted for this champion or not in current season.

fields.name: championLevel
fields.doc: Champion level for specified player and champion combination.

fields.name: championPoints
fields.doc: Total number of champion points for this player and champion combination - they are used to determine championLevel.

fields.name: championId
fields.doc: Champion ID for this entry.

fields.name: playerId
fields.doc: Player ID for this entry.

fields.name: championPointsUntilNextLevel
fields.doc: Number of points needed to achieve next level. Zero if player reached maximum champion level for this champion.

fields.name: championPointsSinceLastLevel
fields.doc: Number of points earned since current level has been achieved. Zero if player reached maximum champion level for this champion.

fields.name: lastPlayTime
fields.doc: Last time this champion was played by this player - in Unix milliseconds time format.

fields.name: gameId
fields.doc: The ID of the game

fields.name: gameStartTime
fields.doc: The game start time represented in epoch milliseconds

fields.name: platformId
fields.doc: The ID of the platform on which the game is being played

fields.name: gameMode
fields.doc: The game mode

fields.name: mapId
fields.doc: The ID of the map

fields.name: gameType
fields.doc: The game type

fields.name: bannedChampions
fields.doc: Banned champion information

fields.name: observers
fields.doc: The observer information

fields.name: participants
fields.doc: The participant information

fields.name: gameLength
fields.doc: The amount of time in seconds that has passed since the game started

fields.name: gameQueueConfigId
fields.doc: The queue type (queue types are documented on the Game Constants page)

fields.name: pickTurn
fields.doc: The turn during which the champion was banned

fields.name: championId
fields.doc: The ID of the banned champion

fields.name: teamId
fields.doc: The ID of the team that banned the champion

fields.name: encryptionKey
fields.doc: Key used to decrypt the spectator grid game data for playback

fields.name: profileIconId
fields.doc: The ID of the profile icon used by this participant

fields.name: championId
fields.doc: The ID of the champion played by this participant

fields.name: summonerName
fields.doc: The summoner name of this participant

fields.name: gameCustomizationObjects
fields.doc: List of Game Customizations

fields.name: bot
fields.doc: Flag indicating whether or not this participant is a bot

fields.name: perks
fields.doc: Perks/Runes Reforged Information

fields.name: spell2Id
fields.doc: The ID of the second summoner spell used by this participant

fields.name: teamId
fields.doc: The team ID of this participant, indicating the participant's team

fields.name: spell1Id
fields.doc: The ID of the first summoner spell used by this participant

fields.name: summonerId
fields.doc: The summoner ID of this participant

fields.name: category
fields.doc: Category identifier for Game Customization

fields.name: content
fields.doc: Game Customization content

fields.name: perkStyle
fields.doc: Primary runes path

fields.name: perkIds
fields.doc: IDs of the perks/runes assigned.

fields.name: perkSubStyle
fields.doc: Secondary runes path

fields.name: clientRefreshInterval
fields.doc: The suggested interval to wait before requesting FeaturedGames again

fields.name: gameList
fields.doc: The list of featured games

fields.name: gameId
fields.doc: The ID of the game

fields.name: gameStartTime
fields.doc: The game start time represented in epoch milliseconds

fields.name: platformId
fields.doc: The ID of the platform on which the game is being played

fields.name: gameMode
fields.doc:
The game mode
             (Legal values:  CLASSIC,  ODIN,  ARAM,  TUTORIAL,  ONEFORALL,  ASCENSION,  FIRSTBLOOD,  KINGPORO)

fields.name: mapId
fields.doc: The ID of the map

fields.name: gameType
fields.doc:
The game type
             (Legal values:  CUSTOM_GAME,  MATCHED_GAME,  TUTORIAL_GAME)

fields.name: bannedChampions
fields.doc: Banned champion information

fields.name: observers
fields.doc: The observer information

fields.name: participants
fields.doc: The participant information

fields.name: gameLength
fields.doc: The amount of time in seconds that has passed since the game started

fields.name: gameQueueConfigId
fields.doc: The queue type (queue types are documented on the Game Constants page)

fields.name: profileIconId
fields.doc: The ID of the profile icon used by this participant

fields.name: championId
fields.doc: The ID of the champion played by this participant

fields.name: summonerName
fields.doc: The summoner name of this participant

fields.name: bot
fields.doc: Flag indicating whether or not this participant is a bot

fields.name: spell2Id
fields.doc: The ID of the second summoner spell used by this participant

fields.name: teamId
fields.doc: The team ID of this participant, indicating the participant's team

fields.name: spell1Id
fields.doc: The ID of the first summoner spell used by this participant

fields.name: champions
fields.doc: The collection of champion information.

fields.name: rankedPlayEnabled
fields.doc: Ranked play enabled flag.

fields.name: botEnabled
fields.doc: Bot enabled flag (for custom games).

fields.name: botMmEnabled
fields.doc: Bot Match Made enabled flag (for Co-op vs. AI games).

fields.name: active
fields.doc: Indicates if the champion is active.

fields.name: freeToPlay
fields.doc: Indicates if the champion is free to play. Free to play champions are rotated periodically.

fields.name: id
fields.doc: Champion ID. For static information correlating to champion IDs, please refer to the LoL Static Data API.

fields.name: masteryTree
fields.doc: (Legal values:  Cunning,  Ferocity,  Resolve)

fields.name: type
fields.doc: (Legal values:  CHAMPION_KILL,  WARD_PLACED,  WARD_KILL,  BUILDING_KILL,  ELITE_MONSTER_KILL,  ITEM_PURCHASED,  ITEM_SOLD,  ITEM_DESTROYED,  ITEM_UNDO,  SKILL_LEVEL_UP,  ASCENDED_EVENT,  CAPTURE_POINT,  PORO_KING_SUMMON)

fields.name: effect
fields.doc: This field is a List of List of Double.

fields.name: range
fields.doc: This field is either a List of Integer or the String 'self' for spells that target one's own champion.

fields.name: lg
fields.doc: Legacy script mode for IE6 or older.

fields.name: dd
fields.doc: Latest changed version of Dragon Magic.

fields.name: l
fields.doc: Default language for this realm.

fields.name: n
fields.doc: Latest changed version for each data type listed.

fields.name: profileiconmax
fields.doc: Special behavior number identifying the largest profile icon ID that can be used under 500. Any profile icon that is requested between this number and 500 should be mapped to 0.

fields.name: store
fields.doc: Additional API data drawn from other sources that may be related to Data Dragon functionality.

fields.name: v
fields.doc: Current version of this file for this realm.

fields.name: cdn
fields.doc: The base CDN URL.

fields.name: css
fields.doc: Latest changed version of Dragon Magic's CSS file.

fields.name: effect
fields.doc: This field is a List of List of Double.

fields.name: range
fields.doc: This field is either a List of Integer or the String 'self' for spells that target one's own champion.

path_params.name: summonerId
path_params.doc: Summoner ID associated with the player

path_params.name: championId
path_params.doc: Champion ID to retrieve Champion Mastery for

path_params.name: summonerId
path_params.doc: Summoner ID associated with the player

path_params.name: summonerId
path_params.doc: Summoner ID associated with the player

query_params.name: freeToPlay
query_params.doc: Optional filter param to retrieve only free to play champions.

query_params.name: queue
query_params.doc: Set of queue IDs for which to filtering matchlist.

query_params.name: endTime
query_params.doc: The end time to use for filtering matchlist specified as epoch milliseconds. If beginTime is specified, but not endTime, then these parameters are ignored. If endTime is specified, but not beginTime, then beginTime defaults to the start of the account's match history. If both are specified, then endTime should be greater than beginTime. The maximum time range allowed is one week, otherwise a 400 error code is returned.

query_params.name: beginIndex
query_params.doc: The begin index to use for filtering matchlist.  If beginIndex is specified, but not endIndex, then endIndex defaults to beginIndex+100. If endIndex is specified, but not beginIndex, then beginIndex defaults to 0. If both are specified, then endIndex must be greater than beginIndex. The maximum range allowed is 100, otherwise a 400 error code is returned.

query_params.name: beginTime
query_params.doc: The begin time to use for filtering matchlist specified as epoch milliseconds. If beginTime is specified, but not endTime, then these parameters are ignored. If endTime is specified, but not beginTime, then beginTime defaults to the start of the account's match history. If both are specified, then endTime should be greater than beginTime. The maximum time range allowed is one week, otherwise a 400 error code is returned.

query_params.name: season
query_params.doc: Set of season IDs for which to filtering matchlist.

query_params.name: champion
query_params.doc: Set of champion IDs for which to filtering matchlist.

query_params.name: endIndex
query_params.doc: The end index to use for filtering matchlist. If beginIndex is specified, but not endIndex, then endIndex defaults to beginIndex+100. If endIndex is specified, but not beginIndex, then beginIndex defaults to 0. If both are specified, then endIndex must be greater than beginIndex. The maximum range allowed is 100, otherwise a 400 error code is returned.

query_params.name: locale
query_params.doc: Locale code for returned data (e.g., en_US, es_ES). If not specified, the default locale for the region is used.

query_params.name: version
query_params.doc: Patch version for returned data. If not specified, the latest version for the region is used. List of valid versions can be obtained from the /versions endpoint.

query_params.name: tags
query_params.doc: Tags to return additional data. Only type, version, data, id, key, name, and title are returned by default if this parameter isn't specified. To return all additional data, use the tag 'all'.

query_params.name: dataById
query_params.doc: If specified as true, the returned data map will use the champions' IDs as the keys. If not specified or specified as false, the returned data map will use the champions' keys instead.
